text: Jahn Otto Johansen (3 May 1934 â€“ 1 January 2018) was a Norwegian journalist, newspaper editor, foreign correspondent and non-fiction writer. He was born in Porsgrunn, Norway. He worked for the newspaper Morgenposten from 1956 to 1966, for the Norwegian Broadcasting Corporation (NRK) from 1966 to 1977, and was chief editor of Dagbladet from 1977 to 1984. Johansen died in Oslo on 1 January 2018 at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Norwegian writers Category:Norwegian journalists Category:Norwegian novelists
title: Jahn Otto Johansen
